title: InviteeConversion
description: Schema for the Conversion Stream owned by the Invitee. A new Stream is created for every new Conversion. Each Conversion Stream is Indexed by the Network.

id.description: An arbitrary identifier for the Conversion issued by the Network.

partnership.description: The partnership associated to this conversion

message.description: The message used for referral correlation and signature verification

sig.description: The Network signature verifying that this conversion originated via an affiliate

seed.description: An identifer native to the Network for the invitee (referred user). Could be a wallet address, or client associated identifer.

event_id.description: The event indentifier indicating which event in the campaign was converted

native_id.description: An identifier native to the Advertiser applied to the invitee referred user. Used to control the number of conversions processed for a given user.

metadata.description: Additional data associated to this conversion

commit.description: An arbitrary number indicating how much of the campaign event limit this conversion consumed
